name: DeleteTagFromBoard
description:
Delete a tag from a Miro board and all associated items.

This tool deletes a specified tag from a Miro board, removing it from all associated cards and sticky notes. Note that changes from the API are not reflected in real-time on the board; a refresh is required to see updates.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the board where the tag will be deleted.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to delete a specific tag.

parameters.name: tag_id_to_delete
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the tag you want to delete from the Miro board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the tag that you want to delete.
